column2: You see a light in the sky in the shape of a cross saying "in this sign you shall conquer"
But what sect shall I choose ?
a christian merchant by the name of Don al Trump has recently brought many of his co-religionist merchants to one of our trade posts
A monk by the name of Brendan has returned from a journey to a far off land. his tales of far off glory has convinced the population of one of our provinces of the truth of his religon
it is time to rid our realm of the heathens and christianize our realm
